data.prayer: Lord, please give the 925 believers in the county of Kinnaur the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Kinnaur, Himachal Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who are far from you in Kinnaur. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 925 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Kinnaur.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church in Kinnaur, Himachal Pradesh, India to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Rajput Rathi people.
Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 925 believers in Kinnaur, Himachal Pradesh, India a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 925 believers in Kinnaur against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.

data.section_summary:
the county of Kinnaur, Himachal Pradesh, India has a population of 84,100.

We estimate Kinnaur has 925 people who might know Jesus, 1,020 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 82,154 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the county of Kinnaur access to a Bible in their own language.

location.name: Kinnaur
